gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint Luke
gospel.text:
[[Lc 6,36]]Jesus said to his disciples: "Be merciful, just as your Father is merciful.
[[Lc 6,37]]Stop judging and you will not be judged. Stop condemning and you will not be condemned. Forgive and you will be forgiven.
[[Lc 6,38]]Give and gifts will be given to you; a good measure, packed together, shaken down, and overflowing, will be poured into your lap. For the measure with which you measure will in return be measured out to you."

psalm.title: Psalms

first_reading.title: Book of Daniel
first_reading.text:
[[Dn 9,4b]]"Lord, great and awesome God, you who keep your merciful covenant toward those who love you and observe your commandments!
[[Dn 9,5]]We have sinned, been wicked and done evil; we have rebelled and departed from your commandments and your laws.
[[Dn 9,6]]We have not obeyed your servants the prophets, who spoke in your name to our kings, our princes, our fathers, and all the people of the land.
[[Dn 9,7]]Justice, O Lord, is on your side; we are shamefaced even to this day: the men of Judah, the residents of Jerusalem, and all Israel, near and far, in all the countries to which you have scattered them because of their treachery toward you.
[[Dn 9,8]]O LORD, we are shamefaced, like our kings, our princes, and our fathers, for having sinned against you.
[[Dn 9,9]]But yours, O Lord, our God, are compassion and forgiveness! Yet we rebelled against you
[[Dn 9,10]]and paid no heed to your command, O LORD, our God, to live by the law you gave us through your servants the prophets.
